paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the KCNH2 gene variant T634S, its functional effects, and implications for arrhythmogenesis.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Prolonged action potential duration leading to arrhythmias.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A missense variant T634A to a conserved threonine residue in the hERG channel pore has been reported in an adolescent LQTS patient.

functional_data.summary: The T634S-hERG mutation shows a loss-of-function effect, leading to prolonged action potential durations.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with potential pro-arrhythmic effects.
key_quotes: This study evaluated possible functional effects of the T634S-hERG mutation on ventricular excitation and arrhythmogenesis.
It was found that the T634S-hERG mutation prolonged cellular APDs, steepened APDr, prolonged the QT interval.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly described in the text.
